amendment.description: Amendments sought to delete $110 million appropriated in the bill for the National Endowment for the Humanities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the $110 million in funds appropriated in the bill for the National Endowment for the Humanities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendments (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 328 (Roll no. 270).
